description:
GroupDocs.Conversion for .NET is a universal document conversion library designed for easy integration into any .NET application. The library allows you to enhance your app with the capability to convert back and forth over 50 document and image file formats.

Keeping above in mind, GroupDocs.Conversion API is developed to make the life easier while working with Conversion. It is a very powerful and easy to use API that provides all basic Conversion operation for a number of file formats. API gets the file as an input and makes its Conversion accessible for the user. Now, its upto the user to perform any of his operations on this Conversion.

The product has the following key features:

- Converting document from all major file formats to all major file formats
- Native .NET API, allowing to third party developers to easy integrate GroupDocs.Conversion in their products
- Simple to use API - basically only one method with set of options for different formats.
- Abstract Storage API
- Abstract Cache API

Note: The library comes up with some limitations in the evaluation mode. In order to test full features of GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET library, please request a free 30-day temporary license.
summary: GroupDocs.Conversion for .NET is a universal document conversion library designed for easy integration into any .NET application.
title: GroupDocs.Conversion for .NET
